Sequence Information.Peptide Name: FK-13 K18R analog (Arg-rich; Synthetic AMPs, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Engelberg Y, Landau M. 2020
Literature.Title: The Human LL-37(17-29) antimicrobial peptide reveals a functional supramolecular structure.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) toFK-13R: 31%.Activity: active against M. luteus (MIC 25 uM) relative to the WT with an MIC of 22 uM. Warning: other bacteria not tested.
